	then, unless this Agreement provides otherwise, that consent or approval may be given conditionally or unconditionally or withheld, in the absolute discretion of that party.

	must be in writing, legible and in English addressed (depending on the manner in which it is given) as shown below:
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;

	is deemed to be given by the sender and received by the addressee:
</TD>

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	if delivered in person, when delivered to the addressee;
</TD>
</TR>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	to the facsimile number of the addressee notified for the purposes of this clause,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:10%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	but if the delivery or receipt is on a
	day which is not a Business Day or is after 4.00 pm (addressee&#146;s time), it is deemed to have been received at 9.00 am on the next Business Day.

	&nbsp;

	print)

<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Know-How License Agreement
</B>
</P>

<B>
	1.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Definitions
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In this Agreement:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Agreed Field
</B>
	means the treatment of cancer;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	means this agreement including the background, any schedules and any annexures;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Approved Sub-Licensees
</B>
	means any Sub-Licensee approved by Prima;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Burnet
</B>
	&nbsp;means the Macfarlane Burnet Institute for Medical Research and Public Health Ltd (ACN 007 349 984);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Burnet License
</B>
	means the Technology License Agreement dated 31&nbsp;May 2001, as amended by Deed of Variation dated 24&nbsp;August 2005,
	to which Burnet acceded by Deed of Accession dated 22&nbsp;December 2005 and as novated by Deed of Novation dated 18&nbsp;April 2012;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Business Day
</B>
	means a day that is not a Saturday, Sunday, public holiday or bank holiday in Sydney, New South Wales;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Commencement Date
</B>
	means 12&nbsp;May 2016;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Confidential Information
</B>
	means any and all information of any nature and in any form (including electronic, magnetic and other
	intangible forms, whether capable of being read by human beings or not) concerning the CVAC Know How, the operations, dealings, organisation, personnel, business strategies, customers, technology, intellectual property rights, trade secrets or
	know-how of a person which is received by, disclosed to or
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage227"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	discovered by the other party (
<B>
	Receiving Party
</B>
	) before, on or after the Commencement Date under, in connection with or as a result of this Agreement, any of the matters dealt with in this
	Agreement or any action taken under this Agreement, but does not include information which:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	is or becomes part of the public domain through no act, failure to act or default of the Receiving Party or any person associated with, or who received that information from or as a consequence of disclosure by, the
	Receiving Party;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	is disclosed to the Receiving Party by a third party lawfully in possession of such information and who is not under any obligation to maintain such information in confidence; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	is developed independently by the Receiving Party without use of or reference to the other party&#146;s information.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Corporations Act
</B>
	means the
<I>
	Corporations Act 2001 (Cth)
</I>
	;
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	CVAC Know How
</B>
	means (i)&nbsp;the Research Results (as defined in the Burnet License) owned by Prima; (ii)&nbsp;the Assigned IP (as
	defined in the Deed of Assignment) assigned to Prima from Cancer Vac Pty Ltd (CAN 096859513) by Deed of Assignment; and (iii)&nbsp;the CVAC Trademarks.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	CVAC Products
</B>
	means any formulation containing mannosylated fusion protein conjugated to mucin1; that has been pulsed ex vivo into a
	patients&#146; dendritic cells and then reinjected back into said patient, developed by or on behalf of Prima prior to the date of the Sub-License, License and Asset Purchase Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	CVAC Sub-License
</B>
	means the exclusive license agreement between Prima and Sydys entered into pursuant to the Sub-License, License and
	Asset Purchase Agreement in the form set out in Exhibit B to the Sub-License, License and Asset Purchase Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	CVAC Trademarks
</B>
	means the trademarks, trade names and logos licensed by Prima from Prima Biomed IP Pty Ltd. as listed in Annexure A.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Deed of
	Assignment&nbsp;
</B>
	means the deed of assignment of intellectual property rights dated 26&nbsp;June 2012 between Cancer Vac Pty Ltd ACN 096 859 513 and Prima;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Dispute
</B>
	means any dispute or difference of opinion between the parties, or the absence of agreement by the parties, about a matter under
	or arising out of this Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Dispute Notice
</B>
	means a notice from Sydys or Prima to the other relating to a Dispute:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	requiring the Dispute to be resolved under clause 13; and

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</TD>

	(b)

	outlining the issues which are the subject of the Dispute;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Further Know-How
</B>
	means all
	trade secrets, confidential and proprietary information generated by Prima and its Affiliates relating to the automation and/or optimization of manufacturing processes for any cell therapy that have been developed by Prima or in conjunction with
	funding by the S&auml;chsische Aufbaubank (SAB) and under contracts with the Fraunhofer Institute for Cell Therapy and Immunology, Leipzig and Database Integrations Inc (DBI), USA. This includes, but is not limited to, documentation for the
	technology transfer of its manufacturing and logistics operations to the United States of America and to Europe, data, know-how and standard operating procedures (SOP&#146;s) (whether patentable or not) relating to the automation of cell therapy
	manufacturing and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage228"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	the optimisation for dendritic cell and other cell therapies, cold chain supply logistics, iCAN Software development, bar code labelling qualifications, shipping qualification and other related
	procedures necessary for the manufacturing and shipment of blood products and miscellaneous cell therapy products.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Improvements
</B>
	means any amendments, changes or additions made by Sydys to any part of the Licensed Know-How;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Insolvency Event
</B>
	means a party
	becoming subject to bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, fraudulent conveyance, moratorium or similar laws affecting creditors&#146; rights generally or by general principles of equity;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Licensed Know-How
</B>
	means (i)&nbsp;CVAC Know How; and (ii)&nbsp;Further Know-How.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	New License
</B>
	means the non-exclusive license agreement between Prima and Sydys entered into pursuant to the Sub-License, License and
	Asset Purchase Agreement in the form set out in Exhibit D to the Sub-License, License and Asset Purchase Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Personnel
</B>
	means
	any employees, agents and approved contractors of a party;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	Related Body Corporat
</B>
<B>
	e
</B>
	has the meaning given to that term in the
	Corporations Act;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Resolution Period
</B>
	means a 20 Business Day period after a Dispute Notice relating to a Dispute is given;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Sub-Licensee
</B>
	means a third party to which Sydys grants a sub-license to the Licensed IP which is not an Approved Sub-Licensee;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Sub-License
</B>
	has the meaning given to that term in clause 2.1; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Territory
</B>
	means the world.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Definitions which are not defined in this Agreement shall have the meaning as defined in the Sub-License, License and Asset Purchase Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.2
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Interpretation
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In this Agreement unless the context requires otherwise:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the singular includes the plural and vice versa;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a gender includes the other genders;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the headings are used for convenience only and do not affect the interpretation of this Agreement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	other grammatical forms of defined words or expressions have corresponding meanings;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a reference to a document includes the document as modified from time to time and any document replacing it;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(f)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a reference to a party is to a party to this Agreement and a reference to a party to a document includes the party&#146;s executors, administrators, successors and permitted assigns and substitutes;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage229"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(g)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	if something is to be or may be done on a day that is not a Business Day then it must be done on the next Business Day;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(h)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the word &#147;person&#148; includes a natural person, partnership, body corporate, association, governmental or local authority, agency and any body or entity whether incorporated or not;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the word &#147;month&#148; means calendar month and the word &#147;year&#148; means 12&nbsp;months;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(j)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the words &#147;in writing&#148; include any communication sent by letter, facsimile transmission or email or any other form of communication capable of being read by the recipient;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(k)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a reference to all or any part of a statute, rule, regulation or ordinance (statute) includes that statute as amended, consolidated, re-enacted or replaced from time to time;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(l)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	wherever &#147;include&#148;, &#147;for example&#148; or any form of those words or similar expressions is used, it must be construed as if it were followed by &#147;(without being limited to)&#148;;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(m)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	money amounts are stated in Australian currency unless otherwise specified;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(n)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a reference to time is to Sydney, New South Wales, Australia time;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(o)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	a reference to any agency or body, if that agency or body ceases to exist or is reconstituted, renamed or replaced or has its powers or functions removed (
<B>
	defunct body
</B>
	), means the agency or body which performs
	most closely the functions of the defunct body; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(p)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any agreement, representation, warranty or indemnity by two or more parties (whether those parties are included in the same defined term or not) binds them jointly and separately.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	License and Sub-License
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	License and Sub-License
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Subject to the terms of this Agreement (to the extent permitted
	by Law), Prima grants Sydys within the Agreed Field in the Territory a non-exclusive, non-transferable
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	license to use the Licensed Know-How; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	sub-license to use the CVAC Trademarks
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	in each case to commercialise and develop the CVAC
	Products and the New CVAC Products anywhere in the world.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

	any CVAC Know How to Sydys.

</TD>

	Sydys acknowledges and agrees to any and all obligations of Prima towards Burnet under the Burnet License regarding the CVAC Know-How, in particular but without limitation to the license granted by Prima to Burnet under
	Sec. 4.4 of the Burnet License.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">

	2.3
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Sub-license
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Sydys may not grant any sub-licenses with regard to the Licensed Know-How
	and no further sub-licenses with regard to the CVAC Trademarks other than to Approved Sub-Licensees.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	3.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

</B>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	3.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Sydys obligations
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Sydys will provide to Prima written annual reports on the progress of the commercialisation of the Licensed Know-How on the Commencement Date.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Sydys shall use its best efforts to support Prima in fulfilling its obligations under the Burnet License and the Deed of Assignment with respect to the CVAC Know How respectively.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Sydys is obliged to grant a respective license to Burnet regarding any Research Results owned by or licensed to Sydys in case Burnet exercises its option to negotiate a non-exclusive license to use the Research Results
	solely to the extent necessary for Burnet to commercialise the Background Technology outside the Agreed Field pursuant to Sec. 4.6 of the Burnet License.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

</B>
</TD>

</B>

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Prima shall not use the Licensed Know-how (except as required under the funding by the S&auml;chsische Aufbaubank (SAB)) and the CVAC Trademarks to commercialise and develop the CVAC products and the New CVAC Products
	anywhere in the world as long as Sydys is not in breach pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.02 of the Sub-License, License and Asset Purchase Agreement.
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

	not in breach pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.02 of the Sub-License, License and Asset Purchase Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>

	All right and title in any and all Improvements belong to Sydys and shall
	be subject to the New License.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	4.
</B>
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) Sydys will immediately notify Prima, with full particulars available,
	if Sydys learns:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	5
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage231"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	of any infringement or potential infringement of any of the Licensed Know-How and CVAC Trademarks by a third party;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	that the use of any of the Licensed Know-How and CVAC Trademarks may infringe the proprietary rights of a third party;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	of any other claims or potential claims against Prima, Sydys, or any Approved Sub-Licensee in any way relating to any of the Licensed Know-How and CVAC Trademarks (including relating to its use, development or
	commercialisation), including without limitation:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(A)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any claim by a third party for personal injury, death or property damage;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(B)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any defects in any products and/or services provided by Sydys and/or any Approved Sub-Licensee which use or incorporate any Licensed Know-How and CVAC Trademarks; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(C)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the need for any recall of any products developed or sold by Sydys or any Approved Sub-Licensee which use or incorporate any of the Licensed Know-How and CVAC Trademarks;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	of any wilful, unlawful or negligent act or omission of Sydys, any of its Personnel, or any Approved Sub-Licensee; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(v)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	of any infringement by Sydys or an Approved Sub-Licensee of any third party&#146;s Intellectual Property Rights.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>

	In connection with any infringement or potential infringement of or by the Licensed Know-How and CVAC Trademarks, Sydys will:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	provide all information and assistance to Prima; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	not take steps on its own without Prima&#146;s prior approval.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	5.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	5.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Fees payable by Sydys
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In consideration of the (sub-)license granted to Sydys under this
	Agreement, Sydys agrees to pay Prima a consideration pursuant to Sections 2.06, 2.07 of the Sub-License, License and Asset Purchase Agreement (allocated as described in there).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	For the avoidance of doubt: The obligation to pay the royalties pursuant to Sections 2.06, 2.07 of the Sub-License, License and Asset Purchase
	Agreement is independent from any expiration or validity of the Burnet License; e.g. Sydys has to pay royalties even after expiration of the patents licensed under this Agreement to Sydys if the requirements of the royalty payments are fulfilled.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	GST
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Definitions
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In this Agreement:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	6
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage232"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the expressions
<B>
	Consideration
</B>
	,
<B>
	GST
</B>
	,
<B>
	Input Tax Credit
</B>
	,
<B>
	Recipient
</B>
	,
<B>
	Supply
</B>
	,
<B>
	Tax Invoice
</B>
	and
<B>
	Taxable Supply
</B>
	have the meanings given to those expressions in the A New Tax
	System (
<I>
	Goods and Services Tax
</I>
	) Act 1999 (
<B>
	GST Act
</B>
	); and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Supplier
</B>
	means any party treated by the GST Act as making a Supply under this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.2
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Consideration is GST exclusive
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Unless otherwise expressly stated, all prices or other
	sums payable or Consideration to be provided under or in accordance with this Agreement are exclusive of GST.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.3
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Payment of GST
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	If GST is imposed on any Supply made under or in accordance with this Agreement, the Recipient of the Taxable Supply must pay to the Supplier an additional amount equal to the GST payable on or for the Taxable Supply,
	subject to the Recipient receiving a valid Tax Invoice in respect of the Supply at or before the time of payment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Payment of the additional amount must be made at the same time and in the same way as payment for the Taxable Supply is required to be made in accordance with this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.4
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Reimbursement of expenses
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If this Agreement requires a party (the
<B>
	First Party
</B>
	)
	to pay for, reimburse, set off or contribute to any expense, loss or outgoing (
<B>
	Reimbursable Expense
</B>
	) suffered or incurred by the other party (the
<B>
	Other Party
</B>
	), the amount required to be paid, reimbursed, set off or contributed by the
	First Party will be the sum of:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	the amount of the Reimbursable Expense net of Input Tax Credits (if any) to which the Other Party is entitled in respect of the Reimbursable Expense (
<B>
	Net Amount
</B>
	); and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	if the Other Party&#146;s recovery from the First Party is a Taxable Supply, any GST payable in respect of that Supply,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	such that after the Other Party meets the GST liability, it retains the Net Amount. The costs (e.g. annual renewal fees) to maintain the
	patents will be directly or indirectly borne by Sydys.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	7.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Confidentiality
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	7.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Obligations of confidentiality
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Each party (
<B>
	Receiving Party
</B>
	) receiving,
	possessing or otherwise acquiring Confidential Information of any other party (
<B>
	Disclosing Party
</B>
	) acknowledges that the Disclosing Party&#146;s Confidential Information is the property of and confidential to or a trade secret of the Disclosing
	Party. Subject to clause 7.2, the Receiving Party must:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	keep the Disclosing Party&#146;s Confidential Information confidential and not directly or indirectly disclose, divulge or communicate that Confidential Information to, or otherwise place that Confidential Information
	at the disposal of, any other person without the prior written approval of the Disclosing Party;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	7
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage233"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	take all reasonable steps to secure and keep secure all Disclosing Party&#146;s Confidential Information coming into its possession or control; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	not memorise, use, modify, reverse engineer or make copies, notes or records of the Disclosing Party&#146;s Confidential Information for any purpose other than in connection with the performance by the Receiving Party
	of its obligations under this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	7.2
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Exceptions
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The obligations of confidentiality under clause 7.1 do not apply to any information that is required to be disclosed by any applicable law or any order of any court, tribunal, authority or regulatory body (but only to
	the extent that it required to be disclosed).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Sydys may disclose Confidential Information of Prima to Approved Sub-Licensees:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	to the extent that those Approved Sub-Licensees need to know the Confidential Information to utilise, develop and commercialise the Licensed Know-How and CVAC Trademarks licensed to them by Sydys in accordance with the
	terms of their sub-license from Sydys; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	if (and only if) those Approved Sub-Licensees are contractually bound by confidentiality obligations at least as stringent as those imposed on Sydys by this clause 7.

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

</TD>

</B>

<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">

</TD>

	In relation to material containing Confidential Information, the Receiving Party must on demand, or at the termination of this Agreement:

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">

</TD>

	if required, destroy any of such material supplied to or received by the Receiving Party or any of its Personnel and supply certification of such destruction where requested.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Despite anything else in this Agreement, the Receiving Party may retain in its files copies of the Confidential Information to the extent the Confidential Information forms part of any board papers or accompanying
	memoranda submitted to, or the subject of presentations at, meetings of the board of directors of the Receiving Party or its Related Body Corporate or any minutes of meetings of the board of directors of the Receiving Party or its Related Body
	Corporate.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	(c)

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Agreement, it is understood and agreed that the Receiving Party&#146;s computer systems may automatically back-up the Confidential Information disclosed to it under this
	Agreement. To the extent that any computer back-up procedures create copies of the Confidential Information (Back-up Copies), the Receiving Party may retain any Back-up Copies in its archival or back-up computer storage for the period it normally
	archives backed-up computer records. Any Back-up Copies will be subject to the provisions of this Agreement until the same are destroyed, and must not be accessed by the Receiving Party during any period of archival or back-up storage other than as
	permitted under this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	to Section&nbsp;7.02 and 7.04 of the Sub-License, License and Asset Purchase Agreement, Prima will not be liable to Sydys, any Approved Sub-Licensee/Sub-Licensee or any third party in respect of any loss or damage (including, without limitation, any
	indirect or consequential loss, loss of profit or loss of revenue) however so caused, whether based on contract, tort (including negligence), statute or any other legal theory, arising directly or indirectly in connection with this Agreement,
	including in respect of the use, commercialisation or the development of the Licensed Know-How and CVAC Trademarks by Sydys or any Approved Sub-Licensee/Sub-Licensee or the act, failure or omission of Prima.
</P>

	other reasonable insurance (in the joint names of Burnet, Prima and Sydys if required). Sydys must provide adequate evidence of power.

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:5%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Sydys must keep books and records sufficient to verify the information
	provided in statements provided to Prima pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.07 (g)&nbsp;(iv)&nbsp;of the Sub-License, License and Asset Purchase Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">

</B>
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

	(a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Sydys must permit Prima and persons or corporations authorised by Prima (including, if Prima so elects, Prima&#146;s external registered auditors) to have access to the books and records of Sydys insofar as they relate
	to this Agreement, on Business Days between 9am until 5pm upon reasonable notice being given to Sydys (
<B>
	Audit
</B>
	). Any information obtained in exercise of the rights of this clause must be kept confidential by Prima and its external auditor and
	not used or disclosed for any other purpose except for the purposes allowed by this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
